ygData.subject: =?utf-7?Q?RE=3A_+AFs-EQCheats+AF0-_Crafted_items_=28some_idiot?= =?utf-7?Q?=29?=
ygData.msgSnippet: Agreed. Here is a couple of them that I know of: Avocets: Shaman/Druid, possible take at level 24 (I did). In my experience, the higher end Avo s are the ones
ygData.messageBody:
Agreed. Here is a couple of them that I know of:

Avocets: Shaman/Druid, possible take at level 24 (I did). In my experience,
the higher end Avo's are the ones with the Charms on them, and the higher
end ones are not takable at 24. Need 25 atleast, is not 26. This is through
kiting. Get a FULL group at 25 and you might be able to take a higher end
avo (but everyone wants charms anymore).

Evil Eyes - Level 24 shaman should be able to solo, wizzies and other good
DD people can do itr a couple levels before. 3 Frost Strikes (even one half
resisted) will kill one.

Frost Totem - Perma..High Shamans, which I've not been in far enough to even
see one... Would suggest a party (full group or MORE than just barbarian
shamans...you'll need a well balaced group) of 25+-.

Griffon Eye...well, if they are from a normal Griffon, the lightest group I
know that could take one is a Druid/Shaman kiting combo at 29/30th level.

Don't know about the others...if anyone would like to explain more or give
more hints as to where/how/what level mobs the other crafted items are on
(Fire Totem, where ARE the Frost Totems in Perma, info on the werewolves),
and frequency of drop, would be much appreciated.

-----Original Message-----
From: dlobdell +AFs-mailto:dlobdell+AEA-stny.lrun.com+AF0-
Sent: Tuesday, August 31, 1999 10:56 PM
To: EQCheats+AEA-onelist.com
Subject: Re: +AFs-EQCheats+AF0- Crafted items (some idiot)


From: +ACI-dlobdell+ACI- dlobdell+AEA-stny.lrun.com

Are you referring to all the quest items for the crafted armor? I
disagree... Griffon eyes, arnt for mid 20's, and the Werewolf talon from
mistmoore castle is REALLY not for mid 20's :)

I think all quest items for the
armor are suited for mid 20s. (if you are a kiter, you
may be able to get them sooner).

Belgarth
